name: SSRMAT
short_description: This software is used to quantify the risk associated with software development (security, monetary, ephemeral, etc... ) and provide tools with which to manage the risk in real-time by calculating the financial risk exposure to various architectural decisions, security processes, continuous code evaluations, security scans, etc... during a softwares full life-cycle. The end goal is to track, manage, and optimize the software development process and profit, while minimizing waste.
summary: Software Security Risk Management Assessment Tool
